channel.title: Hoster Needed
channel.description:
Dear Hosters of RSPS, I've been in need of a hoster for a month since my server has been done. Is a 317 Server. I would love for anyone to host my server. Of course you're going to get a reward or something in exchange and if you're interesed we'll talk about it through PM. Reply if you're interested.
Yours truly, Realistic (Imaginary)

item.title: Hoster Needed
item.dc:creator: @Sidewindscape Sidewindscape
item.description:
@Sidewindscape wrote:

I dont think you can request a hoster in this part of the forum =P

Read full topic
